title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7901.8 - Decision and order
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7901.8 - Decision and order

State Regulations

Upon reviewing the recommendation of a County Energy

Coordinator on an application, or evaluation of an application, and determining
whether an application shall be granted or denied, the State Energy Office
shall issue an assignment order granting the application or a denial order
denying the application. An assignment order may specify that assigned fuel is
to be used for a particular purpose. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7901.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
